shortdesc.ph: Sets the operational permission of the SDK on the audio session.

section.p: This method restricts the SDK’s manipulation of the audio session. The SDK does not configure the audio session anymore.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel. The SDK does not configure the audio session anymore.

ul.li: This method is for iOS only.
This method restricts the SDK’s manipulation of the audio session.

plentry.pd: Sets the operational permission of the SDK on the audio session. This parameter is Bit Mask, and each Bit corresponds to a permission.
